# parser.base.layer_names { #nglui.parser.base.layer_names }

`parser.base.layer_names(state)`

Get all layer names in the state

## Parameters

| Name    | Type   | Description                       | Default    |
|---------|--------|-----------------------------------|------------|
| `state` | dict   | Neuroglancer state as a JSON dict | _required_ |

## Returns

| Type   | Description         |
|--------|---------------------|
| list   | List of layer names |
